General.Name: Acula Technology
General.Description: ACULA Technology Corp. provides video solutions and services in Taiwan and internationally. It offers closed-circuit television (CCTV) monitors; combo DVR/NVR products; IP monitors with POE; IP public view monitors with POE; industrial monitors-touch monitors/point of sale (POS); digital signage/public information displays; medical displays; and OEM or ODM display products. It offers CCTV products for use in apartment complexes, airports, bars, casinos, daycares, schools, parks, fast food restaurants, hotels, night clubs, parking lots, office buildings, shopping malls, train/bus stations, and warehouses, as well as for homeowners; and POS products for food service, hospitality, retail, and public markets; and IPC products are used in food service, hospitality, retail, and public sectors. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
